entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
